document.full_text: seven members of the nato-led international security assistance force (isaf) were killed by a roadside bomb in southern afghanistan on thursday, the coalition said, the worst single incident involving foreign troops in a month.
document.title: roadside bomb kills seven nato troops in afghanistan
lines_and_colors: seven members of the nato-led international security assistance force (isaf) were killed by a roadside bomb in southern afghanistan on thursday, the coalition said, the worst single incident involving foreign troops in a month.
